text: @realDonaldTrump I am a WA State resident & am proud of how @GovInslee addressed the #COVID19 crisis with zero initial federal CDC guidance. His efforts saved lives. I am happy to social distance/wear face masks to save lives. Meanwhile, your inept approaches to #COVID19 cost thousands of deaths
